name: MLABSIUAS
description:
My Legs Are Broken So I'm Using A Shotgun

Hi. Have you ever found yourself in a situation like this?

"Ahhhh my legs oh god oh f██k I can't move my legs"

Well not to worry! No more will you lie on the ground and wait for your legs to heal, because you have a SHOTGUN! Now, you can cause damage to the rest of your body as well!

In this game, you can:

- Get severe whiplash.

- Snap your spine and/or neck.

- Spill blood all over the grass.

- Have a jolly good time!
